title: Instructions for Operating Your APPLE II' Disk Program
Insert the disk into the Drive. Use Drive I when two drives are present
Turn on the computer and the monitor and wait until the IN USE light on the Drive goes off

note: If this doesn't appear, restart the procedure.
title: The program will execute and A will be displayed

note: Single program diskettes do not contain a MENU.
title: After the introductory remarks have been displayed, the PROGRAM MENU will appear on the screen. Select the program you wish by following the instructions on the screen

note: key simultaneously, then press RETURN. This will bring you back to the PROGRAM MENU.
title: If you would like to stop in the middle of a program, press the CTRL key and the "C
To return to the introductory remarks, press the CTRL key and the RESET key simultaneously
If you wish to use a different disk, place it in the Drive and press the CTRL key and the RESET key simultaneously
